docs.text: π.works ¶ Hi, you found my blog. I will introduce my research works and share my thoughts here. IEEE-TRO-2022: Three Dimensional Bearing-Only Target Following [paper] IEEE-RAL-2021: Image-Based Visual Servoing of Rotorcrafts [paper] Contact me via lijianan at westlake.edu.cn in 2023 if you have any questions regarding to my research.
